Author: rinserepeatbehavior
Text: Ahh thank you ♥️ I’m so glad to hear that you’ve gone through this and survived - it’s so hard. Not enough love for myself, I suppose.

Author: earlgreytease
Text: i had this exact same concern with my now-boyfriend. i can confidently tell you that most guys are just happy to be there. he will be so excited about just seeing you at all that he won’t notice any of your so-called imperfections -- in fact, he might even like the things you don’t like about yourself. i know it’s hard but please try not to let your anxiety get in the way of having a lovely time with your boy ❤️ i guarantee he will be looking at you through a much kinder, more appreciative lens than you see yourself through
